system.description:
**Primary Energy:** Earth 6 (solid stone barrier)  
**Supporting Energy:** Space 2 (medium range + wall area)  
**Range:** Medium, 60 ft. (60 feet long, 20 feet high)  
**Duration:** Permanent  
**Total Cost:** 8 Energy  
**Action:** Complex weave (2 actions)  
**Weaving Roll:** Earth Potential + Earth Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery  
**Effect:** Create permanent wall of stone at medium range up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, 6 inches thick (or 30 feet long and 1 foot thick). Each 10ft section has HP = 16 + Earth Potential, DR 4. Can shape into crenellations, bridges, etc.  
**Saving Throw:** None (creates barrier)  
**Success Scaling:** 0 = fails, 1 = 1 minute duration only, 2 = permanent, 3 = double HP, 4 = triple HP and can create complex shapes

---
